item.title: The Commission's "Guidance" on aiding and supporting migrants with facilitation and humanitarian assistance.
item.description:
Angelo Marletta* * FNRS Post-doctoral Research Associate at the Centre de Droit Européen of the Université Libre de Bruxelles. I am grateful to Prof. Chloé Brière for her valuable remarks and suggestions. 1. Context In September 2020, within the framework of the New Pact on Migration and Asylum, the European Commission released its ‘Guidance on the implementation of EU rules on definition and prevention of the facilitation of unauthorised entry, transit and residence’...
